headline: Reasons to Add West Pharmaceutical Stock to Your Portfolio Now
summary: WST is riding on surging GLP-1 demand and HVP expansion. Yet, pricing pressure, tariff risks and contract manufacturing headwinds cloud the near-term outlook.

headline: Is It Time To Reassess West Pharmaceutical Services (WST) After Its Recent Share Price Slide
summary: If you are wondering whether West Pharmaceutical Services is starting to look like value or still priced for perfection, its recent share performance gives you a useful starting point. The stock last closed at US$271.83, with a 3.2% decline over the past week, a 1.6% gain over the past month, a 1.7% decline year to date, and a 17.1% decline over the past year, while the 3 year return stands at 8.3% and the 5 year return at an 8.4% decline.
